enzymeModelFromRxn

PURPOSE

Given a model, a reaction, and the name of an enzyme metabolite, create a model for a pseudoorganism that

SYNOPSIS

function [ pseudo ] = enzymeModelFromRxn( model, reaction, enzyme )

DESCRIPTION 

 Given a model, a reaction, and the name of an enzyme metabolite, create a model for a pseudoorganism that
 carries out the same reaction

SOURCE CODE 

0001 function [ pseudo ] = enzymeModelFromRxn( model, reaction, enzyme )
0002 % Given a model, a reaction, and the name of an enzyme metabolite, create a model for a pseudoorganism that
0003 % carries out the same reaction
0004 
0005 %TODO: fix this line & the input
0006 input_args = {model, reaction, enzyme};
0007 
0008 if length(input_args) < 3
0009     error(['Inputs for enzymeModelFromRxn should be a COBRA model,'...
0010         ' the name or index of a reaction, and the name of an enzyme metabolite.']);
0011 end
0012 
0013 model = input_args{1};
0014 
0015 if ischar(input_args{2})
0016     rxnName = char(input_args{2});
0017     rxnIdx = find(ismember(model.rxns,rxnName));
0018     %make sure we get exactly 1 match
0019     if length(rxnIdx) < 1
0020         error(['Could not find a reaction called ' rxnName ' in the'...
0021             ' given model.']);
0022     end
0023     if length(rxnIdx) > 1
0024         error(['Found multiple matches for the reaction name ' rxnName]);
0025     end
0026 elseif isnumeric(input_args{2})
0027     rxnIdx = input_args{2};
0028     rxnName = char(model.rxns(rxnIdx));
0029 else
0030     error(['The second arugment for enzymeModelFromRxn should be the'...
0031         ' name or index of a reaction in the given model']);
0032 end
0033 
0034 enzmet = input_args{3};
0035 
0036 %create the model
0037 pseudo = createModel();
0038 pseudo.description = ['Enzyme psuedoorganism ' rxnName];
0039 
0040 %copy the relevent reaction details
0041 s = model.S(:,rxnIdx); %stoichiometry as a sparse column
0042 metIdxs = find(s); %index of involved metabolites
0043 stoich = s(metIdxs); %flatten stoichiometry column
0044 mets = model.mets(metIdxs); %metabolite names
0045 rev = model.rev(rxnIdx);
0046 lb = model.lb(rxnIdx);
0047 ub = model.ub(rxnIdx);
0048 rule = model.rules(rxnIdx);
0049 rxnReference = model.rxnReferences(rxnIdx);
0050 rxnECNumber = model.rxnECNumbers(rxnIdx);
0051 grRule = model.grRules(rxnIdx);
0052 metFormulas = model.metFormulas(metIdxs);
0053 metCharge = model.metCharge(metIdxs);
0054 metKEGGID = model.metKEGGID(metIdxs);
0055 metChEBIID = model.metChEBIID(metIdxs);
0056 metInChIString = model.metInChIString(metIdxs);
0057 b = model.b(metIdxs);
0058 
0059 pseudo = addReaction(pseudo, rxnName, mets, stoich, rev, lb, ub);
0060 pseudo.rules(1) = rule;
0061 pseudo.rxnReferences(1) = rxnReference;
0062 pseudo.rxnECNumbers(1) = rxnECNumber;
0063 pseudo.grGrules(1) = grRule;
0064 pseudo.metFormulas = metFormulas;
0065 pseudo.metCharge = metCharge;
0066 pseudo.KEGGID = metKEGGID;
0067 pseudo.metChEBIID = metChEBIID;
0068 pseudo.metInChIString = metInChIString;
0069 pseudo.b = b;
0070 
0071 %add exchange reactions
0072 pseudo = addExchangeRxn(pseudo,mets);
0073 pseudo = addExchangeRxn(pseudo,enzmet);
0074 %TODO: if there aren't any rxns already to compare max/min bounds, will
0075 %this still work?
0076 pseudo = addDemandReaction(pseudo,enzmet);
